item.title: Carl Key InsideMyHouse 20 (Part 1)
item.description:
Inside My House is coming back with a special 4 hours mix ! This 20th episode was created especially for the Berlin-Marathon 2011. A special thanks to Patrick that challenged me with that project: he asked me if it was possible to make a 4 hours set that will “coach” him during the 41.195 km... . Here it is.
Episode 21 coming soon.
item.itunes:author: Carl Key
item.itunes:subtitle: Inside My House is coming back with a special 4 hours mix ! This 20th episode was created especially for the Berlin-Marathon 2011. A special thanks to Patrick that challenged me with that project: he asked me if it was possible to make a 4 hours set that

item.title: Carl Key InsideMyHouse 8
item.itunes:author: Carl Key
item.description: In three weeks time the Amsterdam Dance Event 2008 is starting. Here is a little set to help us wait for this special week-end, the music industry professionals and the good music. I will be in Amsterdam for the ADE so it will be great to meet you there. Enjoy the music !
item.itunes:subtitle: In three weeks time the Amsterdam Dance Event 2008 is starting. Here is a little set to help us wait for this special week-end, the music industry professionals and the good music. I will be in Amsterdam for the ADE so it will be great to meet you there.
